Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:S. aureus (MIC 62 ug/ml), and weakly active against E. coli and V. cholerae (MIC 125 ug/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Characterization of two novel antimicrobial peptides from the cuticular extracts of the ant Trichomyrmex criniceps (Mayr), (Hymenoptera Formicidae).
Literature.Reference: Arch Insect Biochem Physiol. 2017 Mar 27. in press.
Literature.Author: Bhagavathula N, Meedidoddi V, Bourque S, Vimaladevi R, Kesavakurup S, Selvadurai D, Shrivastava S, Krishnappa C.
